attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2025-0063

Date: 2025-01-31

 

Whereas The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade, in Nova Scotia, whose certificate of formation was recorded under the Boards of Trade Act on May 20, 1899, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, dissolves The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade under section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act.


Attendu que The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade (Nouvelle-Écosse), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 20 mai 1899, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade.
attachmentText: PC Number: 2025-0063Date: 2025-01-31  Whereas The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade, in Nova Scotia, whose certificate of formation was recorded under the Boards of Trade Act on May 20, 1899, has ceased to exercise its franchises;   Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, dissolves The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade under section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act.  Attendu que The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade (Nouvelle-Écosse), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 20 mai 1899, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,     À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout The Parrsboro and District Board of Trade.
